information.name: microservices/loglevels
information.descriptionLong:
Manage log levels of microservices.
Loggers define the log levels based on the qualified name of the Java class.
(This only works for Spring Boot microservices based on Cumulocity Java Microservice SDK)

endpoints.name: list
endpoints.descriptionLong:
List all log levels of microservice.
(This only works for Spring Boot microservices based on Cumulocity Java Microservice SDK)

endpoints.name: get
endpoints.descriptionLong:
Get configured log level for a package (incl. subpackages), or a specific class.
(This only works for Spring Boot microservices based on Cumulocity Java Microservice SDK)

powershell.description: Get log level of microservice for a package

go.description: Get log level of microservice for a package
go.command: c8y microservices loglevels get --name my-microservice --loggerName org.example

go.description: Get log level of microservice for a specific class
go.command: c8y microservices loglevels get --name my-microservice --loggerName org.example.microservice.ClassName

pathParameters.name: loggerName
pathParameters.description: Name of the logger: Qualified name of package or class

endpoints.name: set
endpoints.descriptionLong:
Set configured log level for a package (incl. subpackages), or a specific class.
(This only works for Spring Boot microservices based on Cumulocity Java Microservice SDK)

go.description: Set log level of microservice for a package
go.command: c8y microservices loglevels set --name my-microservice --loggerName org.example --logLevel DEBUG

go.description: Set log level of microservice for a specific class
go.command: c8y microservices loglevels set --name my-microservice --loggerName org.example.microservice.ClassName --logLevel TRACE

pathParameters.name: loggerName
pathParameters.description: Name of the logger: Qualified name of package or class

body.name: logLevel
body.description: Log level: TRACE | DEBUG | INFO | WARN | ERROR | OFF

endpoints.name: delete
endpoints.description: Delete configured log level of microservice
endpoints.descriptionLong:
Delete configured log level for a package (incl. subpackages), or a specific class.
This resets its value to the default log level.
(This only works for Spring Boot microservices based on Cumulocity Java Microservice SDK)

powershell.description: Delete configured log level of microservice

go.description: Delete configured log level of microservice for a package
go.command: c8y microservices loglevels delete --name my-microservice --loggerName org.example

go.description: Delete configured log level of microservice for a specific class
go.command: c8y microservices loglevels delete --name my-microservice --loggerName org.example.microservice.ClassName

pathParameters.name: loggerName
pathParameters.description: Name of the logger: Qualified name of package or class

body.name: logLevel
body.description: Hidden property as it is hardcoded within the bodyTemplate
